name: auto-theme-time-switcher
description: Automatically switch VS Code theme based on time of day

autoThemeSwitcher.enabled.markdownDescription:
‚úÖ **Enabled by default** - Automatically switch themes based on time of day

When enabled, your theme will automatically change between light and dark based on the configured times.

Theme to use during daytime ‚òÄÔ∏è

**üìù To select a theme:**
1. Press `Ctrl+Shift+P` (or `Cmd+Shift+P` on Mac)
